item.description:
NANDO MICHELIN with ESPERANZA SPALDING (bass and voice) and RICHIE BARSHAY
(drums) will be presenting their new trio CD "Duende" on Fresh Sound records.

They'll also have some special guests, Nando's 16 year old son Tiago on drums, Teresa Ines and Alida Rohr on vocals and Fernando Brandao on flute.

Nando Michelin, Esperanza Spalding, Richie Barshay Trio w/ Special guest Alida Rohr

Nando Michelin is joined by two of the most impressive musicians of their generation: Richie Barshay on drums and Esperanza Spalding on Bass and Vocals. This is a truly eclectic Jazz group, that uses a wide variety of styles ranging from Brazilian and Latin to Indian music. as a vehicle for a highly interactive performance. Esperanza's haunting voice, Richie's unconventional set including Tablas and Cajon, and the stress placed on original compositions, makes this Trio's live performance a unique musical experience.

Nando Michelin - Piano, Compositions and Arrangements / Esperanza Spalding - Bass, Vocals / Richie Barshay - Drums, Percussion / Special Guest: Alida Rohr - Vocals

Ticket info: $10-$15
Ryles Jazz Club
item.name: Nando Michelin Trio Presenting music from his last CD "Duende" on Fresh Sound
